title: The Secrets of Juriat
description: A quiet eleven year old girl who feels she can't make friends, Natalie spends most of her time reading in her local library. However, her fascination for ancient books tumbles her headlong into an unexpected adventure when she stumbles across a secret portal to a new land, hidden among the wooden bookshelves. Prevented from returning back to her home by a powerful being called Juriat, Natalie has no choice but to find her courage and proceed on an unknown journey with two new children, Marcus and Abigail. Can she trust them? What does Juriat want with her? Why does no-one venture North? Will she find what she subconsciously desires; a place to fit in? Find out in the first book of The Natalie Silver Adventures; The Secrets of Juriat."I didn't want it to end!""Can you finish writing the next one so I can find out what happens next?""Thoroughly enjoyable!"
author: Joanna Cross
